response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This product holds immense value for us, but we are confident it will be a game-changer for you as well. Given its significance, we propose a purchase price of $1,350,000. We believe this offers a fair compromise between the value we place on the product and the benefits it will bring to you. Please let us know if you would like to discuss further details or proceed with this offer. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1350000}
